QuestData.Title: Love Lost
QuestData.Description: Malfurion, my love...$b$bIn vision I saw him, enraged and then distressed, and now lost beyond my mind's reach.$b$bHe is strong, but the horrors that have befallen this land are all-consuming.$b$bI must find him, and you must help me!$b$bGather your wits, $r, and follow me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Tyrande Whisperwind at Starsong Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText: I pray it is not too late, friend.
